content.detailedDescription: Sat on platform, saw a light in nightsky.. light was far away, but pointed in our direction. gave the light some flashes with our flashlight (big one with powerful beam) ufo turned direction and flew over the forrest.. made no sounds at all, there was no wind.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering light in nightsky, changed direction and flew away. made no sounds at all

content.detailedDescription: as i reported some time ago i've watched every tv show on ufo sightings to see if i could see anything similar of what myself & wife saw about 10 miles south of marble falls, texas in the 1980's. it was a very dark but very clear night about 9 pm.   finally i saw something almost exactly what we saw on tv. a huge dark black object with dimly lit rectangular windows. looked like a very slow moving house with no roof. it made no sound whatsoever & couldn't see any objects in the windows. it was very slowly moving from north to south about 60 feet above the highway we were on. now at least i know we're not the only ones who have seen a similar object of this kind. no telling how many others have seen a similar object but haven't reported it to anyone. i have no idea if anyone else saw it that night as we continued on our way home to stillhouse resivor close to harker heights, texas. thanks to mufon's efforts of making it known to the public there are unexplained objects everywhere. kinda wish i could see it again & be ready to take live video of it to pass on to mufon.
content.summary: See below statement.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my garden at around 10pm 10/10/13. i was having a cigarette, and gazing at the stars as it was a very clear, crisp evening. i witnessed triangular set of lights flying across the sky directly above me from north to south. the lights maintained their triangular shape perfectly until heading south ... where they then lost their shape and changed suddenly to circular motions, dancing around one another while maintain their speed and direction.

i witnessed this event from a village north of glasgow.

the lights travelled at speed and covered my visible horizon in about 10-15 seconds.
content.summary: Triangle shaped lights, travelling north to south, as it headed southward the lights changed from a triangular shape to circular motions.

content.detailedDescription: I have made many ufo reports as of the summer of 2013 so my details will be limited. since first sighting of orange fireball ufo in july,  their frequency of appearance has increased. as of 10/10/13 the sighting have become almost daily. there is a group of 4 fire ball ufos that continuously appear in the sky in my area. their flight patterns and formations vary from day to day but they are without doubt some form of aircraft; their unusual flight patterns leads me to believe they are experimental/extraterrestrial in nature. tonight i witnessed what appeared to be a landing in the mountains off in the distance. the craft illuminated the ground below it, but landed below the tree line, so craft details were not visible.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reoccuring orange fireball ufos

content.detailedDescription: I went up to my friend seans house to talk to him for a few minutes. when i got there he had met me in his yard at about 1:08am. we started talking, and then he said "look at that star, its blinking". so we looked at it for a few seconds, and it seemed to start pulsating faster, with a bright whiteish-blue light. i asked him if it was moving, and he had confirmed that it was. it started out moving really slowly, but picked up pace fairly quickly. as it was moving through the sky, it would take a straight path, and then it would look like it was slithering through the sky, almost like a snake would slither. after a few more minutes of watching it, sean went to get his girlfriend chyenne from the house so she could see it. while he was gone, the object came to a dead stop out of nowhere. sean had only been gone for a couple seconds before he returned with chyenne. by the time we were all back together the object had moved from as far as the eye could see from one side of the sky to the other. as the object reached the horizon it made an abrupt turn to the left just before it had disappeared. soon after the sighting, we began to hear strange noises in the woods behind his house. we can't, with any confidence, say that the object that we saw in the sky, and the unusual noises we heard in the woods following the sighting are related, but what we can all agree on is that we've never heard any thing like these noises coming from these woods before. and we've sure never seen anything in the skies like what we all saw tonight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Thought it was a star blinking really fast. then it started moving fast, then slow, and changed directions abruptly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the parking lot of my apartment building and i was getting out of my car and looked up and noticed right above me was a weird looking plane or maybe a drone, it was really short, like the tail end or the back end was shorter than most planes and it flew by this cloud like, circular object in the sky and there was no clouds in the sky, it was clear blue and this object was stationary, it wasn't moving back and forth, it was staying still so i thought that was weird, there was nothing else in the sky in that vicinity at that time. so i went into my apartment to get my binoculars to see if i could see it through my binoculars and went back outside and leaned up against my car. it took me a second to find this object in the sky again because if you are not looking for it, it would be hard to spot it in the clear blue sky so i found it again and tried to look through my binoculars and i couldn't focus them to see the object so then i thought maybe i can get my phone out and take pictures of it and maybe i can see this object in the pictures so i went back into my apartment and got my phone and came back out and had a hard time finding the object again but i did and starting taking pictures of the object at a couple different angles so i took about 4 different pictures and guess what? i got the object in one of the pictures but i have to magnify it in order to see it but you can clearly see that something small and cloud like is in the clear sky, if you magnify it, you can see it, its there.
now with me being a firm believer on ufos and aliens, of course my first thought was its a ufo but now i'm not sure because it could just be a satellite because i know that the iss (international space station) was in the sky the other night and you can see it with the naked eye so then i thought well maybe its just a satellite.  
i'm not sure what it was but i have a picture of it.



**note**
i have the photo saved in my camera on my phone and don't know how to upload it from my phone onto my computer to upload it onto this site.
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Egg,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: At first i saw a weird looking plane or maybe a drone (the tail end was really short) and that flew by this object that i noticed in the sky, just stationary, not moving but it looked like it was shifting into various shapes and spinning around slowly.

content.detailedDescription: Just pulled into my driveway at around 945 pm . was getting groceriesw out of the trunk of my car and was walking to front door of house and looked up and seen a triangular shaped object with 3 red lights, one light on each corner . no sound at at all . it was just above my treetops , i would guess maybe 100 ft off the ground . i noticed it when i was facing south and watched it in a steady slow pace head north east .I would estimate the sixe to be at least 50 ft from light to light . i posted on facebook what i saw and not but twenty mins ago someone east of crossville in kingston tn seen the exact same thing . described the exact same thing i just described. it was flying way to slow for any plane to maintain flight .
content.summary: Triangular shape with red pulsing lights on corners

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While walking dog observed object coming towards me with red and white pulsating lights too high for helicopter was trying to id object dog was barking then object shot straight up and disappeared thru misty cloud absolutely no sound and dog stopped barking could not id  husband said he saw it too from back porch upon my return from dog walk
content.summary: Came towards mw then went straight up

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside playing football with my brother when i noticed a cigar shaped object in the sky to my northeast.  i watched it for as long as i could, travel from northeast to southeast before losing it behind a tree that blocked my view.  

i first noticed the object when i was looking up to catch a football thrown by my brother.

i thought at first it may have been a cargo plane as we are within 10 miles of a regional airport, and am used to seeing planes at different times of the day and different types of airplanes coming into the airport.  

the object was shaped like a cigar that seemed to be reflective and it had a darker band around the middle of the cigar.  there were no wings or any type of flight control that i could see.  the object did not have any discernable sound that i could hear, or any kind of vapor trail that i could see.  the weather in our area was clear skies, about 75 degrees f.  humidity is unknown.  the object seemed to be on a straight line path from northeast to southeast.  speed of the object is unknown due to not knowing the exact distance or knowing the scale of the object.  

at first i wasn't sure what i was seeing, and i tried to see if i could see a tail section or wings on the object.  as i was looking at the ufo, my little brother turned to look in that direction too and he also witnessed it.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo seen for brief period of time

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While doing field work as required by my job,was entertained by 2 lnas jets doing manuevers above me.After viewing them for about 5 min,i noticed something bright to the west of where i was viewing the jets.I turned to notice 1 shiny object seemingly just hovering in the air.I continued watching it and started ruling out possibilities of what it might be by process of elimination. i viewed this object for just over an hour where it would start to fly away in an erratic pattern,moving south then making like a u-turn,then stop.I ruled out a balloon as there was a good south wind about 10-12 mph and the object was going against the wind when it moved.Also ruled out any celestial body as clouds would drift through and the object could be seen clearly below them. it was a bit peculiar to me that it didn't seem to get the attention of the jet's pilots.The jets went away after about a half hour but the object remained. i had other things to attend to so i left the scene still not knowing exactly what i saw. this is the second object i've seen in this area this year. the previous one was also witnessed by at least 3 of my co-workers who were working about 10 miles from me.And was caught on video by a couple of local tv stations.
content.summary: Observed glistening object while watching lemoore naval air station jets  do manuevers.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:35 pm (central time) on thursday, october 10 2013, i was seated in a lawn chair outdoors stargazing to the south on a clear night while cooking dinner.  i observed a triangular shaped craft approaching from the south.  i thought it odd that it did not have the green and red flashing lights that ordinary aircraft exhibit during nighttime flight.  the second thing i noticed is that the craft did not make sound.  the vehicle made an abrupt, instantaneous 90 degree turn without slowing.  i got up, ran, opened the patio door and shouted to my wife, "come quick, i see a ufo, this is for real!"  

my wife made it out the door in time to see the vehicle from it's rear side as it traveled to the north east.  she confirmed that what we observed did not resemble an ordinary aircraft, and that it did not emit sound.  i observed 5 bright white lights that formed an elongated triangle:  each point of the triangle had a light.  on each side of the triangle, a light was positioned approximately  halfway between the the leading front light, and the two lights forming the points of the tail.  i'd estimate the object's altitude to be between higher than 2,000 feet, but lower than 7,000 feet.  the object was larger than any jet that i have seen.  considering it's size, it is difficult to estimate it's speed, but it was faster than a low flying single engine propeller craft, and slower than a commercial jet liner. 

this is the very first time that i have observed an unidentified object flying in the sky.  was it some form of experimental military aircraft, or a craft that came from some other planet?  that i do not know.  what i do know is that i have never, ever, seen a vehicle that large change direction instantaneously!  unfortunately, the event unfolded so quickly that i did not have time to grab a camera.
content.summary: Triangle shaped, white light outlined craft near portage, wisconsin

content.detailedDescription:
After work, i stopped at franks liquor store in century city.... popped in for milk. came out and decided to take in the lovely day; i had been inside all day at work. the sky was blue as blue could be (with only a very few sparse upper atmosphere clouds (very high, very thin, hardly any though). as i circled taking it all in (from west towards the east), suddenly i spotted a very small and extremely high up shiny silver object. i stopped and stared, and stared somemore; it did not move. it was too early for stars. it appeared extremely silver and shiny (my guess from the low western sun). i was flabbergasted.

i must have stood there staring up into the sky for at least 20 minutes. a gentleman came along and asked me what i was staring at. at that point, it was centered between 2 very thin, yet noticeable clouds --- i pointed up, and said look between those 2 clouds. he looked up and said 'oh yea' and asked what it was... i stumbled for words, not really spitting any out. i did manage to tell him that it hadn't moved since i spotted it. he then went into the liquor store, bought his 'whatever' and upon coming back out, asked if it was still there and had it moved. i nodded to still there, said no it hadn't moved --- he looked up and again asked what it was.... i again fumbled for words (one doesn't really say, 'ufo' and be believed). he again said what was it, then in his own words said, "et"? i said, quite possibly perhaps. he said i was scaring him and he proceeded home. i quickly ran to the back door of the store and asked the owner if he had any binoculars.... and of course he did not.

i must have stared for almost 50 minutes or so, not wanting to leave -- but wanting to leave. i live 5 minutes from that location. i knew if i could get home that i had camera, binoculars, compass, whatever --- at home that could help me document the moment. i finally decided that i had taken in this incredible moment long enough, and if i didn't try to get home (twilight was coming very shortly) - that i'd have absolutely no chance to see it better from home.

i raced home, i pulled out my binoculars and watched it. it took some time to 'refind it' as the sky was vast (in binocular-view), but there it was still!!!! it had not moved. i didn't think that my camera could catch it in low-light sky at that point so  watched until real stars starting appearing faintly and finally the completely sun set and there was no distinguishing it from stars. 


a few footnotes to add....

** it was extremely hard to tell if this was a cigar-shaped, or dumbell-shaped object. it did not appear as an oval. it was so high and my eyes just could not properly focus on the 'shape' of it. i might have to insist however that it appeared dumbbell-shaped most of the time, however cigar-shaped would have been my first thought except that very often it appeared to have 2 round ends on it.

** quite often it went transparent. i do not think it was due to extremely thin clouds at the same altitude. while it might have been my eyes, there appeared to almost be a fuzzy grey-black transparent cloud/something around it when it went transparent. i saw that everytime it went transparent. almost, as crazy as it sounds ---- as though it had a shield around it, or entered a slightly different realm for the moment. once it showed itself again, the greyish fuzziness around it disappeared. i do not think that it was my eyes creating that fuzziness, otherwise why wouldn't i see the fuzziness all the time while watching it.

** while watching it from the parking lot, an extremely high-flying aircraft flew perhaps 10 degrees to it's right. while i have no clue how high the object was, it went transparent as the aircraft flew by. it appeared that the two might have been in the same way upper airspace (both extremely high up there)... the aircraft was so very tiny leaving a contrail behind it.... it was very high up there. it certainly appeared as though the object was being cautious and did not want the aircraft to notice it whether with their instruments or maybe even perhaps with their own eyes.

** at some point, i realized that i had my cell phone. although a crappy phone camera, i did pull it out and took some pictures. sadly, i can't see a thing in any of them. when enlarged, they're too artifacted to see anything in the blue sky other than blue sky.

** one final note. and this i've no clue what it was, perhaps nothing. but at one point (this too was while in the parking lot), there appeared something much lower and to my right up in the sky. i watched it and watched it and it flew an extremely straight line and it never waivered. it's speed never increased nor decreased, it did not go up or down at all. i watched it until it was gone from my eyesight, i think it just sort of got too small and blended into the sky. it was a very light brown colored triangle. i thought it to poss be a balloon or a bag but watching it proved that it neither. it was fairly small, but at it's height - possibly the size of a car? it had no dimensional look to it whatsoever; it was flat..... no sides, no top, no bottom. it flew with 1 point forward and the other 2 points basically ---- 1 up, 1 down. it was very weird considering what i was seeing otherwise at the time. it flew much lower, think ballon-height when you can still see it pretty well (although not too low and definitely not a small dot). once it disappeared from site, i watched to see if it would "meet up" with the silver object.... but i never saw it again. i think it was way too small and even if it did meet up --- one would have never seen it. that too, i will never know what it was.... but it was awfully strange. i have not included it in this report as an object seen (reported only the main object /// only 1 object), it just doesn't seem like i should, although...... ????

i would have reported this sooner, but mufon didn't even occur to me until the next day or two. having 2 extremely important events to deal with since then leaves me with my reporting of the event today. once here --- pure enthusiasm to see other reportings on the same date. way back in my youth, i had 'an experience' --- something at night and never able to prove a thing (although i know what i saw way up in the night sky)...... since then, my eyes have always travelled to the sky, always looking. i still cannot believe that i saw something, and especially during the daylight. i know what i saw the other day, and absolutely no one can take that away from me..... what i saw was as real as you and i. i still tingle.
content.summary: Saw areflectiveobject highinthesky hovering-itnevermoved. silvershinysurface (frmsunreflect? sunlowinwestsky) occassionallytransparent notduetoclouds (hidfrmveryhighplane). cigarordumbell-shaped (toohightotell). amazing!

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside at 7:32pm, looked towards the ne, the sky was clear, the bright object that i normally see and watch for was coming towards me, it made no noise, very bright and would brighten even more after it got right above me, i stood there just watching it and taking random pictures of it, then it slowly turned towards the ne, and got real bright again and slowly moved off into that direction, i stood there watching it till it was out of sight. it didn't scare me, i've seen it many times before, but not in awhile, it was like almost telling me; "yes, we are still here, and watching you. the pictures that i have taken along with a short video will not be summited at this time, i can tell you that in one of the pictures you can make out the shape, it looks close to a pinwheel and there is another square object with it in one of the frames, but i did not see the square object when taking the picture.
content.summary: They know im watching them, or could it be they are watching me?

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i took a look at the moon before going into the house for the night. as we looked into the western sky we observed a very bright object heading in a distinct eastern path. 
 there was no sound and it was not a plane. the bright object was lower than a plane. we could not believe how fast it was traveling as we watched the object disappear over the hill.
content.summary: Saw a very bright object  quickly moving in a easterly path

content.detailedDescription:
Just after dark on tuesday night, october 8, 2013, around 8:30 pm central time in alexandria, tennessee, i wanted my 10-year-old boy to come outside to look at the moon and venus. as we stared at it for a very quick moment owing that my son was interrupted from his video game and forced to see this site, he said, "okay, i saw it!" however, as he turned away to go back into the house, he said, "hey dad; what's that?!" in the northern sky, almost 180 degrees north from where the moon and venus were, there was a large, perfectly round ball in the sky being illuminated by the sun.  the reason i know it was the sun illuminating this object is for the same reason all the planets are illuminated at night - planets do not give off their own light; neither does the moon.  it takes the sun far enough below the horizon casting its light toward the heavens (outer space); and, whatever objects happen to be high enough to catch those sunrays is going to be illuminated!  this is the case of the ball we saw.  when my son saw this and got my attention, i could not take my eyes off of it.  i told my son to run in the house and get his mother.  he did and left the front door opened on his return to stare at the ball.  she was slow coming, so i hollered for her to hurry up.  she came running, began to stare at what we were staring at, and could not comment!  we all just stood in the front yard staring at the ball. 

i began to tell my family the following facts as we all stood there in agreement and amazement:
1) there were no flashing lights; 
2) it looked just like someone was in the sky holding a light bulb; the ball was perfectly shaped round, not oval like some planets, but rather absolutely perfectly round - just like the lighted end of a light bulb;
3) there was no sound; and, we live in the country where there are no other distracting sounds; and,
4) as it sat still, and as i was focused on it to see if it was moving like an airplane; like a drown; like a helicopter; like a space shuttle; like a satellite; or like a space station, i saw it very, very slightly zigzag.  the zigzag was almost undetectable because it was not going across the sky; it was as though it was moving in the direction of space when it did the little zigzag; nevertheless, the ball was still the same shape, very big!  it never moved left or right.  it also appeared as though it came back just a bit, but i am not 100 percent it moved backwards.  while it was just sitting there, it ascended as far as the eye could see to a point so small, it was as small as the smallest star in the northern distant deep space ��� until it continued to get even smaller until it was undetectable.  

going from a big ball, bigger than anything i had ever seen in the sky, and moving in the direction of deep space in a matter of two seconds, seems reasonably certain to say it was a controlled spacecraft of advanced knowledge. 

now that two days have gone by and i have had time to verify in my mind all the facts, i surmised that if one were to count, "zero, zero, one; zero, zero, two," that���s how fast it went into deep space.  

it did not ever go across the sky.  it never made a sound.  it had no flashing lights.  there were no other objects or airplanes anywhere near it. we did not see it arrive. it just sat there, and we stared at it for approximately three minutes. when it left, it did not go straight up.  it went in the exact angle towards deep space as those distant faraway northern stars reside ��� the tiny ones the naked eye can only see by not staring directly at them.  the bottom line, it was freaky!!! 

my questions are:
just how far away was this ball when we saw it?  that can never be answered because i believe it was being illuminated by the sun. because it was night, and in order for objects to be illuminated by the sun at night, as our planets are, objects have to be a lot higher than we realize. an airplane passenger jet, for example, would not have been illuminated by the sun at this time of night; and, they fly approximately five miles high.  when they are five miles high, or even one mile high, they look just like airplanes. 
end
content.summary: After the sun went down, almost 180 degrees north of the moon, a large white ball (exactly like a light bulb), was sitting still in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
In the springtime 2013 i had been recurrently awoken at 4:08am night after night for three or four nights.  i had nosebleeds occurring concurrently.  it flet like something was "stuck" up my nose, left side, and i felt the need to keep working at it.  then after a couple of days a very small object came out of my nostril and was no bigger than one-sixteenth of an inch.  very, very small it was.  upon closer inspection by me, it was a symmetrically shaped pointed object on both ends.  it flet like an ivory colored piece of plastic.  below you will find a sketch of the shape of this.  remember, it was much, much smaller than the sketch.

i want you to have this in case anyone else ever has the same experience and brings it to your attention so you will have collaborating story.

also, i mentioned a very round, very bright object in the low horizon in the southwest sky visible from my langhorne home.  i had seen it in spring 2013.  it was evident last night, too.
content.summary: Very bright, round object in low horizon in southwest sky

content.detailedDescription:
Date: october 10 2013
time: 7:45 am to 7:50 am
location: stevenson expressway going into downtown chicago, somewhere near midway airport.

details: me and my mom were driving to downtown chicago when we saw two unmoving points of light that looked like stars above the horizon.I only noticed them because they looked like stars and i know you cant see stars during the day, also i thought it was strange they didn't move so they couldn't be planes. they were placed apart from eachother horizontally one a little lower than the other. the two points as i said did not move but they would fade in and out. there were planes in the sky at various altitudes but all moved steadily and none shone as brightly if at all. the "stars" eventually faded out to much smaller points, eventually i either lost track of them or they just disappeared. there were no buildings or towers nearby that these lights could have come from. at first i thought they might be planes but when i saw they didn't move i knew they weren't, they stayed in one place for too long to be planes. 

weather: some clouds low on the horizon but clear skies everywhere else. the points were above the clouded horizon quite far up in the sky.

second sighting
same day
8:20 am
location: driving on lake shore drive
north east direction toward chicago.

i saw one smaller point of light in the sky above chicago. they appeared to be faint and faded in and out a couple of times before disappearing.

at about that time i saw another faint light flickered over the lake a few times

i saw two helicopters, one over the lake hovering in place, another moving over the city. neither seemed high up enough to be the points of light and they were black. it is possible that the points of light could have been reflections on helicopters but unlikely. the points of light didn't appear to be any sort of plane or helicopter and they would probably have to be much higher up to appear so small and distant. i know what helicopters and planes look like at high altitudes, and these points of lights didn't resemble either.

 

later the same day,maybe 3 hours or so had passed since the first sightings i saw a couple more of these lights as we were driving away from chicago. both were very faint and brief, one appeared to be in front of some thin clouds, either that or it was shining through the cloud. as we moved away from the city however i no longer saw these lights. we drove out to indiana that day for some errands and i scanned the sky there as well. no lights. it appears that these lights can only be seen near the chicago area and over the lake.


up until this point i have never seen a ufo. so i was very excited when i saw these. i have tried to explain them many ways, like maybe their helicopters? very unlikely. weather balloons? im not even sure what those look like but i dont think thats what they were. i spent the rest of the day scanning the sky for any similar phenomena, but i haven't sighted anything since. i do plan to if i get the chance bring my telescope and a camera to downtown chicago or somewhere nearby to see if i can get pictures. unfortunately though my camera is old and not good quality so im not sure what good that would do. if anyone has seen these strange star like objects near chicago please let me know, or even if you have sighted them else where. this is my first post here but i am sure that people will be able to comment. i really would appreciate feed back. also if you have any explanations for what i saw let me know. if it turns out to be something normal and terrestrial i may be a bit disappointed but i still would want to know, i am definitely open to any explanations.
content.summary: Stationary star like objects during the day

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cousin walk at night and watch the stars just to see shooting stars and how bright the sky is. at 7:45 pm we looked to the east and their was a light as bright a venus. the light was moving at least 10x or more the speed of any aircraft in the sky. we watched it go from east to north east very fast change direction once and go back the same direction. the object was not a plane of any kind and it was not a meteor it had no tail and it was very bright.
content.summary: Bright as venus

content.detailedDescription:
The event happened not to me, but to a friend of mine. i was inside my apartment, when i heard my friend scream 'ufo ufo' so i went outside to see what was going on. when i got outside, she was telling some other people about what she had seen. she told me that while she was outside with her dog, she was looking on the direction of ne when she saw a strange object just above some trees. at first glance, she though that it was an airplane, but then she told that the object hovered above the trees, at straight angle, she realized that it was not an airplane, when the ufo moved to the left, and then moved to the right! she then told me that the ufo was disc shaped, and it was pulsating a whitish color light in the middle of the ufo. after she saw the whitish light pulsating, and not been able to move while she was observing the event, she saw the ufo just disappeared! 

after the ufo event, i made her write everything down, and made her do drawings of the ufo. she told me that she was feeling scared because she had never witness a ufo... after talking with her for a while, she still could not believed that she saw a strange object. 

she also wrote everything she saw besides the drawings of the ufo..  she wrote it all in spanish.
content.summary: Ufo over apartment complex.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside and something caught my eye. i walked over and in the cement that is what i saw.
i went in and took some pictures with a digital camera outside it was dark by then. it was unbelievable the number of varied shapes and forms coming through the cement.
the next day i continued taking pictures a short time later it started to drizzle and i took a couple of pictures.
today is the 10th of oct.
i feel everything happens for a reason, i shared these photos with over
a dozen people they saw what i saw and more.
one of my friends told me about this site.
when looking or talking about the photos i get a tingle.
content.summary: Outside something caught my eye. it was the outline of an et

content.detailedDescription: It has been 2 weeks since my wife drove into something invisible sat. night 9/21/13 around 8pm in the rain down near ft. bragg coming home, sober from her girlfriends home. nancy said she was driving along at about 40 to 45 mph. since the rain was so hard and she was not in a hurry in such nasty weather, anyway she was driving into a slow curve in the road when she blacked out on impact with nothing?!! she came to when a moore county sheriff was knocking on her window. nancy was given breathalyzer which she passed because she hadn't been drinking and he wanted to know what happened since the complete front end was caved in dead center. problem was she was in her lane on this 2 lane black top and now she was parked 6ft. on other side of her shoulder of the road. the suv had no skid marks no glass, plastic, nothing around our suv so we don't know what to make of it and thought i would write you to see if you have heard about collisions involving something invisible and just driving along and bam. our air bags didn't deploy so she broke her forearm and her face slammed against steering wheel biting thru her lower lip and splitting her mouth open. he called an emergency vehicle who checked her out and asked if she wanted to go to hospital but she was in shock & didn't realize her injuries until next day when her arm got x-rayed. we don't want any publicity only wanting to let others know? i was going to say warn others but you wouldn't be able to prepare for that.
content.summary: She was driving into a slow curve in the road when she blacked out on impact with nothing?!!

content.detailedDescription:
I went to let my dogs out around 8:35 pm and noticed 2 objects from a distance, traveling south and west toward my house.  the first thing i noticed was 3 orange/red balls of light but multiply that by 2 since there was a pair, one closer than the other and moving slow.  as they got closer and i really had a fantastic view i noticed that the 3 orange balls of light - formation like an upside triangle, were in an orb or bubble - almost like glinda from wizard of oz.  i ran into my house to get my camera and when i returned, only one was in site and snapped a few pictures with my olympus 
6.3-63 mm zoom and captured one good picture.  when it was leaving it looked as though it followed the same path, but in reverse.   when i viewed the pictures, i was surprised to see this fireball because vividly i can remember seeing 3 lights in an upside down triangle within a faded orb or bubble.

i can tell you that i did not see anything resembling a plane, helicopter or wish lantern, just something incredibly, unusual.
content.summary: Upside down triangle formation of 3 orange-red balls of light within an orb or bubble like sphere. bright.

content.detailedDescription:
Venia de trabajar en un shoping, como vivo en cipolletti y mi trabajo quedaba en neuquen, siempre hacia el trayecto en bicicleta. recuerdo que era de noche, tipo 22hs, era epoca de reyes magos, asi que habiamos tenido una largo dia de trabajo duro. yo venia de regreso a casa en mi bicicleta a punto de entrar en el puente que conecta cipolletti con neuquen, cuando me llamaron la atencion unas luces que, segun lo que pense en ese momento podrian llegar a ser luces del mirador, que se ven desde ese lugar, pero cuando giro mi cabeza para ver de que se trataba, no entendia que era lo que veia, por que esperaba ver luces de alguna supuesta fiesta que se solian hacer en el mirador; el tema es que detube mi marca para poder obserbar mejor de que se trataba, y cuando me detengo y miro bien me di cuenta que estaba viendo un objeto que volaba al raz de las copas de los arboles, era un objeto muy grande de unos 15 metros de largo por 4 de ancho, tenia forma obalada, pero solo se veia su silueta y obviamente las luces que en un principio me llamaron la atencion, las cuales giraban y delataban un movimiento circular de las mismas. una vez reconocido el objeto me asuste, y lo primero que hice fue ver si alguien mas veia lo que yo estaba viendo, pero los autos pasaban por el puente sin para ni mirar, era de noche y no habia nadie cercano como para corroborar. cuando vuelvo a ver el objeto que estaba suspendido en la copa de los arboles este hace un movimiento hacia adelante y regresa rapidamente a su lugar, como si fuera de tergopol, un movimiento muy sutil y suabe, para lo cual la situacion me estaba asustanndo bastante, asi que decidi seguir camino en mi bicicleta hasta mi casa lo mas rapido que pude, mire hacia atras cuando me estaba alejando y el objeto seguia en el mismo lugar. quizas si me hubiera quedado mas tiempo el objeto hubiera seguido ahi unos varios minutos. 
bueno eso fue todo, siemplemente paso eso, es creer o rebentar. saludos!
content.summary: Estaba suspendido en el aire, era de nocha, solo se veia la silueta de forma ovalada, y muchas luces que indicavan un movimiento circular. tenia el tamaã±o de un micro de larga distancia.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of october 4, 2013 around 9:50pm, my wife and i decided to go look at the stars. we were in front of my parents house in salem, oregon facing south. the sky was very clear that night and, after a minute or two i spotted something that at first i thought might have been a far off plane. it came out from behind a group of trees that was sw of us flying at a very low altitude (the object was parallel with the tops of the trees), and heading east at a very slow pace. i was confused because it was low flying, slow and noiseless, so i alerted my wife to it and she immediately noticed it also. we were observing what appeared to be a small bluish-white light with the occasional blink of red light that seemed to be too off tempo to be a planes. after a minute or so, it finally went behind a larger tree that is taller than the others around it. interestingly, i noticed that before it reached the tree it changed direction  going slightly up. then, as it was behind the tree, it changed course completely and was now going west with jumpy, erratic movements. almost like it was caught on a fishing line and was getting reeled in, at first fast then slow, then almost motionless all the while with an occasional blink of red. this startled me and i exclaimed out loud to my wife and myself. ending up behind the same group of trees that i originally first saw it fly out of, it then changed course again coming back out of the trees going east. at that moment, it was very bright and shone through the trees whitish light. coming into the clearing, it was clearly visible with a star-like shining white-blue light that was glinting off of a dark shape. the light was brightest on the right side and on the left is where the red blinking light was located. finally, with the same unpredictable skip-like movements, it flew behind the tall tree and at that time shone a very bright white light right through the tree at us that illuminated the area. this made us booth exclaim aloud and as we watched it, it smoothly came out of the other side of the tree, hovering east parallel to the smaller treetops. it slowly moved east then seemed to stop and descend behind the trees where we lost sight of it for a minute. we knew it was there and shortly later we caught sight of it moving just below the tree tops, kind of going up and down. it was like it was playing hide and seek with us and it made awkward movements right above the trees, going side to side and up and down. ascending slowly into the sky, it made all sorts of movements, going in all directions. at this time it was clearly visible and i tried desperately to make out what it looked like. it was like a blue-white arrowhead shaped light that was very radiant and star-like. the light it produce seemed to be bouncing off of its own shape on all sides, especially on the right which was clearly arch-like, and the bottom. now it started slowly moving west, growing in brightness and gaining a clearly defined central triangular light. going behind the tall tree, it moved in an unexplainable pattern and then slowed dramatically. at this point, i was very shaken up and when i saw it moving around i was like a frightened animal shaking in fear. it was just beyond the tall tree and what amazed me is that it changed from the white light i was seeing to an incredible golden radiance. it stood almost motionless and seemed to be growing much more radiant than before. the shape looked exactly like an angel. continually moving west, it seemed to turn slightly and stop. that is when we saw something extraordinary. it now had a translucent golden arrow-head shape encompassing the central light and two constant red lights on its left side, one atop the other. the central light was brilliant golden with the same arrowhead shape and light coming from all sides. then moving west at a quicker pace, i noticed that the central light could have been three lights grouping together in a triad formation right before it disappeared behind a large group of trees and we lost sight of it for good. 
	i watched this object the entire time it was in view, never taking my eyes from it. in the beginning of the encounter, i had thought that my eyes were playing tricks on me but as i continued to watch, i knew my eyes were fine and i was witnessing something incredible. i was amazed and astounded at what i had seen and exclaimed a lot during the event. its magnificent star-like radiance left me awestruck. by the time it was leaving, it was large, bright and obvious in the sky, and the golden triangle that surrounded it was very clearly defined. the way this object moved is absolutely unexplainable and confirmed to me that it was definitely not one of our typical aircraft. the event lasted about 15 minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliant star-like object hovers above trees and shines bright lights before changing into golden triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
We(my husband, myself and 3 of our 4 children, aged 21, 19 & 16) arrived home from an outing at about 11:30pm on monday october 7th, 2013. 
we were in  the midst of a terrible family crisis (stemming from a horrible argument between me & my 16 yr. old) and in much distress. there was hysterical crying and screaming and emotions were so high that i chose to gather some essentials and drive off somewhere to be alone. 
i was attempting to get into my vehicle while my husband was imploring me not to leave. this went on for several minutes because i was determined to go. as i was about to get into the truck, ignoring my husband's wishes (my 21 yr. old had pleaded with me prior, to stay as well. she was distraught)a bright glowing light had appeared in a cloud directly in front of us. it was the only visible cloud in an otherwise perfectly clear sky and it flickered and flashed the reflection of the light which seemed to emanate from it. 
this was a huge distraction to which i asked, "what is that in the sky?" 
my husband turned to look at it and answered, stunned, "i don't know... a ufo." 
we thought for a second, that it was a meteor, headed straight for us but we quickly realized that it was much too low and not moving.   
we were mesmerized by it and continued to watch as it seemed to emerge from the cloud and grow in size and intensity. it shone the brightest white at this point. i ran down the driveway and positioned myself on the road, in line with it, which was perfectly in line with our home. it was about 1.5 kms or 1 mile away, straight out over a corn field to the south, 500-1000ft high, at about a 40 degree alt. it looked to be between 50-100ft in diameter. it appeared as a massive round light with no visible detail, just light.
my husband ran in to tell everyone to come back out (including his 23 yr. old son who had been at home) to see the phenomenon. the 6 of us watched (i, on the road, my 21 yr. old on the lawn behind me, crying frantically for me to come back and my husband and the other 3 kids behind her, on the front porch) as it remained still, suspended directly in front of us, changing from an enormous fiery orange sphere of light to a brilliant white, before it shrunk and disappeared in an instant. 
despite his intense fear, my husband managed to capture 4 images of the object with his phone. he moved while taking one of the shots, which you'll see looks like 2 lights, but there was just one.
we've discussed and pondered and tried to figure out what exactly took place that night. and while i continue to try to work through family problems, i can't help feeling that what occurred was an intentional distraction from an increasingly desperate situation, that instantly halted it, possibly preventing something tragic from happening and ultimately unifying us.
the actual event lasted approximately 5 minutes but the effects  of it will be with all of us forever.
content.summary: A bright light appeared in a low, solitary cloud directly in front of our house. it seemed to emerge from the cloud which reflected its flickering/flashing. it remained still, grew, intensified, shone orangish to white, then shrunk & disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I am making this report for my wife because she is afraid to make it. she called me at 7:15 am this morning 10/10/13 stating she could see a ufo. she said there was a large metallic triangle with a semi circle back side floating in the air a pretty good ways off. she said from her angle the triangle was near the horizon, about the size of a centimeter, had well defined edges and was glowing the exact same color as the sun rise probably because it was reflecting the morning sun. she said it was a triangle that looked like an arrowhead. she said if she had to estimate it was floating near la porte's city hall. i checked google maps and la porte's city hall is about 8 miles away from where she was standing. even from that distance she said she could definitely see the shape of the object, an isosceles triangle with the back rounded inward like a semi circle, the back corner edges rounded and the front end was sharp, like an arrowhead. she could not estimate how thick it was. i asked her if the object could be the size of a jumbo jet and she say "maybe, but i don't know because it's too far and i can't judge how high up it is" there was no noise detected from the object, but we assumed it was because of the distance from the object. she said she had been watching the object for about 3 minutes now and it had not appeared to be moving or changing directions, just hovering over that location. i suggested that maybe the object was moving away from her to it appeared to be floating, but she insisted the object was not moving while she was observing it. i asked her if there were any windows, lights or markings on the object and she said she could not see any markings or windows, but that the object was reflecting the sun so it was hard to tell. she could tell there were no lights blinking or flashing near or on the object (like you see on all regular planes).
i asked her to take a picture with her iphone and email it to me, but no matter how much she zoomed in or out the object would not show up on the iphone's camera. i asked her to take the picture anyway and send it to me. we both think that the brightness of the sunrise was preventing the object from showing up in the picture. i have attached the image, but i cannot see the object in the photo at all, the sun was too bright. my wife had to go into work, when she left to go inside she said the object was still floating in the air. i asked my wife to draw the shape of the object and send me a picture. the second attached picture is a rough sketch of the object on a white board.
    my office is a few miles from la porte's city hall. i stepped out of my office shortly after the phone call, at about 7:40 am, and looked in the direction my wife had described. i could not locate the object. i then looked toward the general direction of where she works, also a few miles away, and could not see the object. i am reporting this hoping someone else closer to the object has more details.

     the only other details i have to add is that we have grown up living in this area and are aware of the airports in the area and the usual aircraft that fly in and out of them. we are near ellington field as well and have seen many out of the ordinary military aircraft flying in and out, this object did not move like a conventional aircraft that she has seen over the last roughly 30 years.
content.summary: Large floating metallic isoscelese triangle with semi circle back end

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping soundly when i felt like i was being smothered. in my dream i related it to being wrapped up in a rug. i screamed for help in my dream and awoke with a start not being able to move. i looked to the ceiling like i do when i have disturbing dreams to release them out of my mind and tried to stay awake for a moment. almost immediately i was back asleep and i even told myself that i didn't want to be asleep and tried to wake up still having the feeling of being confined. this time i was surrounded by a white coloring with black bar-like holding devices. it seems like they were trying to keep me calm as i could hear calming music being played. i told myself that this wasn't real and wasn't right and i started to see thru the white as though i was seeing through their illusion and could really see what was going on. needless to say this freaked me out quite a bit. i was released and found myself staring up at my ceiling again. i concentrated on a particular shadow and was comforted thinking it was my cat's head displayed in shadow until i realized she just made a small noise on my wife's side of the bed. the shadow moved and i immediately turned on the light to check out what was making the shadow. my wife thought i was nuts. i told her about what was going on and when my mind went back to thinking about the shadow i realized that something had to have been in the room with me. now, i have seen some freaky scary things in my life before and am not normally scared (and have even talked to stanton friedman about ufo sightings), but when i just tried to talk about it to my wife i broke down and had a full-blown panic attack, hyperventilating and all, totally freaking out. i have no idea what happened last night. i can't say 100% what it was or if i am not totally going insane but even my wife heard something in the house later on as we were trying to debunk what had happened. "oh it is just one of the kids" she said. "go check" i said and she did only to find both boys sound asleep where they should be in there room. tonight i hope to look at what could have made the shadow in depth and come up with a size to generate more information on this case.
content.summary: Possible abduction attempt

content.detailedDescription: Went outside and viewed an unusual star to the northeast. we do a lot of night skywatching with our telescope.  this "star" was rapidly pulsating and changing colors.  i  thought maybe it was a plane in the distance but didnt seem right.  grabbed our binoculars and the light was bright white and saw initially a disc shape with many colored lights rabidly pulsating and changing. during this time it was moving farther away and never focused in again ona shape but only rapid changing lights.  it almost seemed like it was morphing its shape and tumbling/spinning ball of light.  with the naked eye seemed very star-like.  however, through the binoculars you could see individual lights flashing off and on of colors of white, blue, orange, and red. it continued. to get smaller and after watching it for about 75 minutes i couldnt distinguish individual lights anymore. it was headed north northeast.
content.summary: Viewed through binoculars a ball of light that kept morphing in shape emitting many colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i arrived home late after dropping his brother off at his house down the road, they had seen a green streak across the sky we thought it may be the comets everyone is talking about. we arrived back home and as we were walking up the steps i had an urge to look at the stars.I went to the porch railing, which is facing east, and looked up to see a bight light, it seemed to glow purple but when i blinked thinking it was my eyes playing tricks on me it started to glow light green. it was moving a slow pace south bound. i called for my husband still thinking it was my eyes playing tricks, he came out and i asked him to look up and tell me what he sees. he looked up and his mouth got wide i asked him if it was just me or was that star moving he said yes it was moving. he ran inside to get our video camera, as he came back and started his camera it started to slowly descend down toward us at the same slow pace it had been traveling south at. it did not descend very far before stopping and hovering. we stayed out there for hours watching it pulse different colors and swinging back and forth. while filming we noticed that there were several aircraft in the area coming quite close with the ufo, they kept flying by and the coming back as if they were also watching what we were seeing. finally at sunrise the ufo ascended and disappeared. the aircraft that had been flying around the whole time continued to fly around our house for an hour looking for the ufo.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My husband and i saw it from our back porch glowing brightly.
